desc.text: Learn the keybindings to enter multicursor editing
Learn smart patterns to make multicursor editing more efficient
Learn how to apply multicursor techniques for format conversions
A set of examples made for DH-scholars
Test the limits of multicursor editing

puzzles.title: Push to Path
puzzles.subtitle: medium
puzzles.hint: **Fastest Solution:** duplicate template-line down (5x), multicursor-select all `push` with Ctrl+D, 2x(Left), Ctrl+Shift+Home, 2x(Ctrl+Shift+Right), Ctrl+X, move in multicursormode to `'all'`, Ctrl+D to highlight, Ctrl+V
